63#define UARTn(n) ((UART0_Type*)(UART0_BASE + (n * (UART1_BASE - UART0_BASE))))

72typedef enum
73{
74 AM_HAL_UART_CONTROL_CLKSEL,
75} am_hal_uart_control_e;
76
77//*****************************************************************************
78//
80//
81//*****************************************************************************
82typedef enum
83{
84 eUART_CLK_SPEED_DEFAULT = 0,
85 eUART_CLK_SPEED_NOCLK = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_NOCLK + 1,
86 eUART_CLK_SPEED_24MHZ = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_24MHZ + 1,
87 eUART_CLK_SPEED_12MHZ = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_12MHZ + 1,
88 eUART_CLK_SPEED_6MHZ = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_6MHZ + 1,
89 eUART_CLK_SPEED_3MHZ = UART0_CR_CLKSEL_3MHZ + 1,
90 eUART_CLK_SPEED_INVALID,
91} am_hal_uart_clock_speed_e;

101{
102 //

110
111 //
113 //

115
116 //
118 //

124am_hal_uart_config_t;

146

169#define AM_HAL_UART_MAXIMUM_BAUDRATE_A1 921600
170#define AM_HAL_UART_MAXIMUM_BAUDRATE_B0 1500000
171
172//*****************************************************************************
173//
176//
177//*****************************************************************************
178#define AM_HAL_UART_WRITE 0
179#define AM_HAL_UART_READ 1
180#define AM_HAL_UART_WAIT_FOREVER 0xFFFFFFFF
182
183//*****************************************************************************
184//
186//
187//*****************************************************************************
188
189//*****************************************************************************
190//
193//
194//*****************************************************************************
195#define AM_HAL_UART_DATA_BITS_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_WLEN, 3))
196#define AM_HAL_UART_DATA_BITS_7 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_WLEN, 2))
197#define AM_HAL_UART_DATA_BITS_6 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_WLEN, 1))
198#define AM_HAL_UART_DATA_BITS_5 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_WLEN, 0))
200
201//*****************************************************************************
202//
205//
206//*****************************************************************************
207#define AM_HAL_UART_PARITY_NONE 0
208#define AM_HAL_UART_PARITY_ODD UART0_LCRH_PEN_Msk
209#define AM_HAL_UART_PARITY_EVEN (UART0_LCRH_PEN_Msk | \
210 UART0_LCRH_EPS_Msk)
212
213//*****************************************************************************
214//
217//
218//*****************************************************************************
219#define AM_HAL_UART_ONE_STOP_BIT (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_STP2, 0))
220#define AM_HAL_UART_TWO_STOP_BITS (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_STP2, 1))
222
223//*****************************************************************************
224//
227//
228//*****************************************************************************
229#define AM_HAL_UART_FLOW_CTRL_NONE 0
230#define AM_HAL_UART_FLOW_CTRL_CTS_ONLY UART0_CR_CTSEN_Msk
231#define AM_HAL_UART_FLOW_CTRL_RTS_ONLY UART0_CR_RTSEN_Msk
232#define AM_HAL_UART_FLOW_CTRL_RTS_CTS (UART0_CR_CTSEN_Msk | \
233 UART0_CR_RTSEN_Msk)
235//*****************************************************************************
236//
239//
240//*****************************************************************************
241#define AM_HAL_UART_FIFO_ENABLE (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_FEN, 1))
242#define AM_HAL_UART_FIFO_DISABLE (_VAL2FLD(UART0_LCRH_FEN, 0))
244
245//*****************************************************************************
246//
249//
250//*****************************************************************************
251#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_1_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 0))
252#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_1_4 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 1))
253#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_1_2 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 2))
254#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_3_4 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 3))
255#define AM_HAL_UART_TX_FIFO_7_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_TXIFLSEL, 4))
257
258//*****************************************************************************
259//
262//
263//*****************************************************************************
264#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_1_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 0))
265#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_1_4 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 1))
266#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_1_2 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 2))
267#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_3_4 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 3))
268#define AM_HAL_UART_RX_FIFO_7_8 (_VAL2FLD(UART0_IFLS_RXIFLSEL, 4))
270
271//*****************************************************************************
272//
275//
276//*****************************************************************************
277#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_OVER_RUN UART0_IER_OEIM_Msk
278#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_BREAK_ERR UART0_IER_BEIM_Msk
279#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_PARITY_ERR UART0_IER_PEIM_Msk
280#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_FRAME_ERR UART0_IER_FEIM_Msk
281#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_RX_TMOUT UART0_IER_RTIM_Msk
282#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_TX UART0_IER_TXIM_Msk
283#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_RX UART0_IER_RXIM_Msk
284#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_DSRM UART0_IER_DSRMIM_Msk
285#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_DCDM UART0_IER_DCDMIM_Msk
286#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_CTSM UART0_IER_CTSMIM_Msk
287#define AM_HAL_UART_INT_TXCMP UART0_IER_TXCMPMIM_Msk
289
290//*****************************************************************************
291//
298//
299//*****************************************************************************
300#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_TX_EMPTY (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_TXFE, UART0_FR_TXFE_XMTFIFO_EMPTY))
301#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_RX_FULL (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_RXFF, UART0_FR_RXFF_RCVFIFO_FULL))
302#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_TX_FULL (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_TXFF, UART0_FR_TXFF_XMTFIFO_FULL))
303#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_RX_EMPTY (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_RXFE, UART0_FR_RXFE_RCVFIFO_EMPTY))
304#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_BUSY (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_BUSY, UART0_FR_BUSY_BUSY))
305#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_DCD_DETECTED (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_DCD, UART0_FR_DCD_DETECTED))
306#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_DSR_READY (_VAL2FLD(UART0_FR_DSR, UART0_FR_DSR_READY))
307#define AM_HAL_UART_FR_CTS UART0_FR_CTS_Msk
